welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shizuoka, Japan! Known for its stunning views of Mt. Fuji, delicious green tea, and beautiful beaches, we invite you to explore and experience the charm of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Sawayaka (さわやか)
restaurants.description: Sawayaka (さわやか) is a steakhouse located in 静岡市.
restaurants.address: 葵区鷹匠1-1-1 (新静岡セノバ 5F), 静岡市, 静岡県, 420-8508

restaurants.name: 清水港みなみ
restaurants.description: 清水港みなみ is a seafood restaurant located in 静岡市.
restaurants.address: 駿河区森下町1-41 (タイヨウビル 2F), 静岡市, 静岡県, 422-8061

restaurants.name: Cherry Beans (チェリービーンズ / Cherry Beans)
restaurants.description: Cherry Beans (チェリービーンズ / Cherry Beans) is a burger joint located in 静岡市.
restaurants.address: 葵区伝馬町8-1 (サンローゼビル 2F), 静岡市, 静岡県, 420-0858

restaurants.name: のっけ家静岡店
restaurants.description: のっけ家静岡店 is a japanese restaurant located in 静岡市.
restaurants.address: 葵区紺屋町4-27 (森川ビル 1F), 静岡市, 静岡県, 420-0852

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mount Fuji Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mount Fuji Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
